title: 主线程卡死
body:
您好,请问我执行该解压后,会导致解压期间主线程卡死,是必须要异步执行该方法么?
[SSZipArchive unzipFileAtPath:downloadPath toDestination:destinationPath overwrite:YES password:nil error:&error delegate:self]
author: survivorsfyh

comments.body:
Ah, Yes. If you want the decompression to be asynchronous then it should be fired on it's own operation queue or thread.  

是。如果希望解压缩是异步的，那么它应该在自己的队列或线程上被触发。

Well, why would we return to the main thread from the lib?
Main thread is used for UI, while zipping/unzipping is unrelated to UI.

i need to turn the results back to the UI;
so call the main thread in asynchrony;
Then, yes, you need to call `dispatch_async(dispatch_get_main_queue()` yourself. :)

title: when swift4.0 support?
body: I build my project in Xcode9.0 ,swit4.0, show the error: Module complied with swift3.1 cannot be imported in swift 4.0
author: XcqRomance

comments.body: clean your derived data and rebuild. The code is in ObjC, not Swift.

Yep. I have a Swift 4 project running in Xcode 9 and it works great. The only swift in the project is the demo project and that does not affect the main library. 
I'm going to close this. Let us know if cleaning derived data does not resolve.
thanks, clean derived data, and rebuild in Xcode 9. It resovled
